subject: JUNITas Ant-Task in Eclipse 2.1
msgSnippet: Servus, I don t want to ask the same question more than one time, but I can t believe, that there isn t anybody out there, who uses JUnit from an Ant-Script
messageBody:
Servus,

I don't want to ask the same question more than one time, but I can't
believe, that there isn't anybody out there, who uses JUnit from an
Ant-Script running in Eclipse.

If somebody has running this configuration, please contact me and tell
how to do that!

Have a nice day

Wolfgang
